items.title: Anthropic’s AI-generated blog dies an early death
items.description: Anthropic was experimenting with an AI-generated blog. TechCrunch profiled it. Then, Anthropic shut it down.

items.title: Warner Bros to split cable and streaming businesses in major restructuring
items.description: As cable television continues to experience stagnation, with the trend of cord-cutting growing stronger each year, Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) is ada...

items.title: A Researcher Figured Out How to Reveal Any Phone Number Linked to a Google Account
items.description: Phone numbers are a goldmine for SIM swappers. A researcher found how to get this precious piece of information through a clever brute-force attack.

items.title: Google fixes bug that could reveal users’ private phone numbers
items.description: The bug allowed a researcher to uncover recovery phone numbers of nearly any Google account.

items.title: Qualcomm to acquire semiconductor firm Alphawave Semi for $2.4B
items.description: Qualcomm has acquired Alphawave Semi, a U.K.-based semiconductor company focused on high-speed data center connectivity, for around $2.4 billion.
